data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Ural Yekaterinburg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny's Georgi Melkadze scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Ismael Silva to set up the goal.
In the minute 4, Pavel Kukuyan signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 6, Akhmat Grozny have a goal kick.
Pavel Kukuyan awards the home team a throw-in.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny surge into the attack at Akhmat-Arena but Andrey Semenovâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
Akhmat Grozny's Vladimir Iljin breaks free at Akhmat-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Pavel Kukuyan signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 20, Throw-in high up the field for Akhmat Grozny in Grozny.
Vladimir Iljin for the home team is judged to be offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
In the minute 23, Akhmat Grozny's Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov gets in a shot on goal at Akhmat-Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 24, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny just outside Ural Yekaterinburg's area.
Stefan Strandberg is booked for the away team.
Ismael Silva of Akhmat Grozny gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 26, Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Andrey Panyukov of Ural Yekaterinburg is pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 32, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Evgeny Kharin (Akhmat Grozny) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 33, Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
Akhmat Grozny needs to be cautious. Ural Yekaterinburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 34, The away team replace Vyacheslav Podberezkin with Yuri Bavin.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to Akhmat Grozny's area.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
Akhmat Grozny are coming forward and Evgeny Kharin gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Akhmat Grozny have been given a penalty at Akhmat-Arena...
In the minute 38, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
In Grozny Akhmat Grozny attack through Georgi Melkadze. The finish is off target, however.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
In the minute 38, At Akhmat-Arena, Stefan Strandberg has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
A massive blow for Akhmat Grozny as Vladimir Iljin misses from the spot.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 40, Pavel Kukuyan signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
The away team have replaced Danijel Miskic with Vladimir Rykov. This is the second substitution made today by Yuriy Matveev.
Artem Timofeev (Akhmat Grozny) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 41, Vladimir Iljin for Akhmat Grozny drives towards goal at Akhmat-Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Pavel Kukuyan awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny's Bernard Berisha has been booked in Grozny and will miss the next match through suspension.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at Akhmat-Arena.
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Pavel Kukuyan will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Akhmat-Arena.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov (Akhmat Grozny) has received a yellow card from Pavel Kukuyan.
In the minute 47, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 50, Ural Yekaterinburg's Othman El Kabir misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Ural Yekaterinburg are pushing forward but Andrey Panyukov's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Roman Emeljanov is replacing Branko Jovicic for the away team.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 55, Penalty! Pavel Kukuyan points to the spot, great chance for Akhmat Grozny...
Othman El Kabir gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ural Yekaterinburg.
Bernard Berisha nets and Akhmat Grozny extend their lead to 2-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 59, In Grozny Ural Yekaterinburg drive forward through Andrey Egorychev. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
In the minute 60, Andrey Talalaev is making the team's first substitution at Akhmat-Arena with Anton Shvets replacing Ismael Silva.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Lechii Sadulaev is on a sub for Evgeny Kharin for Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Vladimir Rykov (Ural Yekaterinburg) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Akhmat Grozny!
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny pushes forward through Anton Shvets, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Oleg Ivanov is replacing Bernard Berisha for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Akhmat Grozny make their fourth substitution with Idris Umaev replacing Artem Timofeev.
In the minute 75, Vladimir Iljin for Akhmat Grozny is whistled offside.
Anton Shvets (Akhmat Grozny) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, David Karaev is on a sub for Andrey Panyukov for Ural Yekaterinburg.
Yuriy Matveev (Ural Yekaterinburg) is making a fifth substitution, with Chingiz Magomadov replacing Andrey Egorychev.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Lechii Sadulaev (Akhmat Grozny) has received a first yellow card.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
In the minute 80, Denys Kulakov for Ural Yekaterinburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 82, Pavel Kukuyan signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nikita Karmaev is replacing Vladimir Iljin for the home team.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny's Nikita Karmaev has been booked in Grozny.
In the minute 88, Akhmat Grozny drive upfield and Nikita Karmaev gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ural Yekaterinburg defender.
Akhmat Grozny's Georgi Melkadze gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Ural Yekaterinburg defender.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg close to the penalty box.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
Anton Shvets (Akhmat Grozny) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
